concept.title: Tic Tac Toe: Galactic Conquest
concept.description: A strategic topdown 2D Tic Tac Toe game where players battle across a cosmic grid, aiming to achieve galactic domination by conquering sectors.
concept.objective: To win a set number of Tic Tac Toe matches consecutively or reach a target score by conquering planets on a larger cosmic map.
mechanics: Placing 'X' or 'O' marks on a 3x3 grid to form a line (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally).
Navigating a topdown star map with multiple interconnected Tic Tac Toe 'planets'.
Winning a Tic Tac Toe match on a planet claims it for your faction.
player_abilities: Strategic 'warp' to different planets on the star map.
Limited-use 'gravity well' to temporarily disrupt opponent's placement (visualized as a brief area denial on the grid).

enemies.name: Nebula Nuisance
enemies.behavior: Plays a basic, predictable Tic Tac Toe strategy.  Focuses on blocking rather than offense.

enemies.name: Comet Crusader
enemies.behavior: Aggressively attempts to win by prioritizing offensive moves, sometimes leaving itself open to counter-attacks.

enemies.name: Black Hole Baron
enemies.behavior: Employs advanced AI, analyzing multiple moves ahead and employing complex defensive and offensive strategies.

powerups.name: Quantum Shift
powerups.effect: Allows the player to swap the positions of two of their existing marks on the current Tic Tac Toe grid.

powerups.name: Nebula Shield
powerups.effect: Protects the player's next placed mark from being erased or overwritten by the opponent for one turn.

concept.level_progression: Players progress by conquering planets on the star map. Each conquered planet may unlock new challenges, harder AI opponents, or new powerups. The ultimate goal is to conquer a specific number of planets or a central 'Galactic Core' planet.
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for each Tic Tac Toe win. Bonus points are awarded for winning matches quickly, achieving perfect wins (no opponent moves), or winning multiple games in a row. Conquering planets adds to a cumulative galactic influence score.
concept.visual_style: Retro sci-fi with a clean, minimalist aesthetic.  Bright, glowing 'X' and 'O' markers against a dark, star-filled background.  Planets on the map are stylized celestial bodies with subtle animations.  UI elements are reminiscent of old computer terminals.
concept.sound_theme: Synthwave soundtrack with a focus on atmospheric pads, pulsing basslines, and electronic percussion.  Satisfying 'zap' and 'thump' sound effects for placing marks, and a triumphant fanfare for winning.  Subtle ambient hums for the cosmic background.

level_design.name: Proxima Centauri Outpost
level_design.description: Your first mission: secure the Proxima Centauri system. A small outpost needs to be cleared of lingering pirate activity and claimed for the Galactic Alliance. Beware of their primitive defenses and patrol routes.

assets.player: A simple, glowing blue triangular ship, slightly elongated.

enemies.aggressive: A sharp, angular, glowing purple star shape.

powerups.health: A bright green, stylized plus symbol enclosed in a circle.
powerups.speed: A yellow, streaking arrow pointing forward.

obstacles.wall: A solid, dark grey rectangular block.
obstacles.rock: An irregular, dark brown blob with a slightly rough texture.

assets.background: A deep black expanse filled with small, twinkling white dots representing stars. Occasional faint, swirling nebulae in shades of blue and purple.

ui_elements.score: Green, blocky digital font displaying the current score, similar to an old calculator.
ui_elements.health_bar: A horizontal bar, filling from red to green, with segmented lines to indicate health levels. Appears within a simple, outlined rectangle.

theme: a simple tic tac toe game
